name: Seven Secrets
description:
WASD or Arrow keys move the camera

Left Click on Planets to visit them.

WildCard: Player standing idle helps their progression.  The more you enjoy the music, the easier it will be to find secrets.

WildCard: Dare to fail.  If you never find any secrets, I hope you'll enjoy the journey.

Available for browser play or Windows download.  The browser version works, but the sound experience is not as pleasant as in the Windows version.  If anyone's got some tips for baking the sound better for HTML5, I'd love to hear it.  

In both versions there seem to be two issues:

Sometimes clicking on the planets doesn't do what you think it would.  If this happens to you, try clicking on a different planet.  This is definitely worse in the browser version.  

There's an interpolation issue on planets moving quickly away from you.  If you get stuck behind a planet, just wait a moment.  The planet will slow down eventually and you'll catch up.  You'll enter orbit when your distance < 100.
